title: Kim Kardashian's "Troop Beverly Hills"-Themed Baby Shower Will Give You So Much Pinterest Envy
text:
â€‹Kim Kardashian's latest party is going to make every single mother-to-be want to step up their baby shower game. Kim threw a â€‹Troop Beverly Hills- â€‹themed bash and I bet you are groaning because you wish you'd thought of that first (me too).
On Sunday, she celebrated the upcoming birth of her new baby with her family and close friends (Kim was forced to reschedule her initial baby shower plans after Lamar Odom was hospitalized ). Her sisters Kylie Jenner and KhloÃ© and Kourtney Kardashian posted pictures of the almost dead-perfect â€‹TBH â€‹camp site recreation (yes, those are thin mints on that ottoman) on Instagram:â€‹

"Just our usual morning routine," wrote Kylie. At the party, Kendall Jenner also had some "trouble" with Kylie's new $50,000 puppy Rolly .
I have a problem
A video posted by Kendall Jenner (@kendalljenner) on Oct 25, 2015 at 3:17pm PDT
You may recall that Kim is a known fan of the classic 1989 â€‹Shelley Longâ€‹ comedy:
KhloÃ© took a break from caring for Lamar Odom during his recuperation to spend some time with her sisters. She posted this pic (which also includes a glimpse of her new shorter hair), captioned "Sister Sunday."
